p: The Si electrodes using the PAU- g-PEG binder were also prepared with various mass loading conditions of the active material, and their capacity retention was compared, to further evaluate the electrochemical properties of the Si@PAU-g-PEG, which exhibited the best cycle and rate characteristics (Fig. 5b). This was performed at high loading levels of 0.8 mg cm −2 and 1.0 mg cm −2, higher than the condition of 0.5 mg cm −2 at which stable cycle performance was obtained. The evaluation was conducted at 0.5 C for all three cells.
